mapper.select: select I.I_PK, I.M_PK_WRITER, I.I_TITLE, I.I_PRICE, I.I_CATEGORY, I.I_REGDATE, I.I_UPDATEDATE, I.I_STOCK, I.I_COMMENT, I.I_READ_COUNT, I.I_CONTENT, I.I_COUNTRY, I.I_MATERIAL, I.I_COLOR, I.I_SIZE, M.M_NAME, C.C_CATEGORY, (select count(*) from REVIEW_ITEM where I.I_PK = #{i_pk} ) as RI_COUNT, (select count(*) from HEART_ITEM where HI_I_PK = #{i_pk} ) as HI_COUNT from ITEM I JOIN MEMBER M ON I.M_PK_WRITER = M.M_PK JOIN CATEGORYNAME C ON C.C_PK = I.I_CATEGORY where I.I_PK = #{i_pk}
select * from(select rownum as rnum, I_PK, I_TITLE, M_PK_WRITER, I_PRICE from (select I_PK, I_TITLE, M_PK_WRITER, I_PRICE from STUDIO order by desc)) where rnum between #{param1} and #{param2}
select hi_pk from HANDUS_IMAGE where hi_fk = #{i_pk} order by hi_main desc
